Room.Name: Custom Swords
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Custom Swords shop in Leonardo's Foundry.
Room.LongDescription: Various types of weapons may be purchased from Leonardo here, but his specialty is swords. Almost every known type of sword may be purchased here. There are a couple of gold swords also for sale as well, but since gold is so soft, they do not make very good weapons. They are worth quite a bit, though, more as collector's items.
